name: Primotech
description:
Primotech is a Global IT Solutions company. We’ve been delivering software development and IT projects from several big enterprises to small and medium-sized businesses. 
Web Design & Development- ASP.Net, C#, PHP, Ruby on Rails, MVC, Blockchain, MEAN, MERN and Python.
Mobile App Design & Development- Native and Hybrid apps for iOS and Android platforms.
Digital Marketing- SEO, SMO, PPC, App Store Optimization and Content Writing.
We blend agile methodologies with technical expertise to take your business to the next level. We have an impressive puddle of resources in the store who are well versed in their respective industries: Mobile App Development, Website Design & Development & Quality Assurance. 
READ MORE...

locations.address: D-91, Floor – II, IND. Area, Phase 7, Mohali
